name: Fate Of Kingdom
description:
You play as a royal magician putting his knowledge into test and repaying his debt to the royal family by saving them from the inevitable doom of the kingdom's fall.

Story 

There's no time. The kingdom has fallen. You recon it's your last chance to prove yourself. You get up, get your staff, dress your favorite hat and gather all your will and strength to save the ones that saved you once and were merciful when no one else believed you: the Royal family. 

You look in the mirror. Your beard is white. You're not the same you were ages ago, when anything seemed possible and quite easy. 

Time shows its effects on you, but it's not time to dream about the past. It's all or nothing.  Save and protect the Princess to find the rest of the Royal family before they vanish with the world.

Challenge the one responsible for this destruction and end this once and for all.  Do you think you have what it takes?  We'll see.

Controls
  • Player Movement: WASD
  • Attack: Left Mouse Button
  • Aim: Mouse
Team

Game Producer : R4hulCorleone

Designers : unbirthday , Atomic

Programmers : R4hulCorleone, Vicoodi

Composer and SFX : Marian Walczak

Art : Tensei , jonik9i , 0x72
